meta.label: Object detection query sampler
meta.description: To determine which samples need to be labeled next -often referred to as queries- we can leverage the classifier we have already trained. The more uncertain the model is on how to classify a sample, the more improvement its label can bring to the model . There are various ways to define the model uncertainty and therefore different strategies you can choose from.

inputRoles.name: saved_model
inputRoles.label: Managed folder with model weights
inputRoles.description: Folder generated by the object detection plugin training recipe

outputRoles.name: queries
outputRoles.label: Data to be labeled
outputRoles.description: Dataset containing the unlabeled data with an associated uncertainty score
